titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-695, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 227.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 785.

POSTPONED VOTE - At the conclusion of general debate the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mrs. Slaughter demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 211 - 196 (Roll no. 469).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/23/2004--Passed House without amendment. Waives a specified requirement of rule XIII to provide for the consideration of H.R. 1308 (Tax Relief, Simplification, and Equity Act of 2003).
